alert.note: Alert for Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 9:01PM CST until December 29 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN ETOWAH COUNTY... At 901 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cherokee Rock Village to near Glencoe, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Ballplay, Tabor Road, Gadsden Mall, Southside, Gadsden Steam Plant, Big Wills Creek, Keener, Black Creek, Gadsden Water Works, Wilsonia and Reaves. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
